Items.c: 獸骨、凝玉露、仙療丸,各一。缺一不可,就等少俠去張羅了。
Items.mt: Veterinary bones, jade dew, immortal healing pills, one each. The first of these is the one you need, and you'll have to wait for the young knight to get it.
